description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Generali Investments – vaša aplikacija za pametno investiranje
Z aplikacijo Generali Investments imate svoje naložbe vedno pod nadzorom. Investirate, spremljate in prilagajate lahko kjerkoli in kadarkoli – hitro, varno in brez obiska poslovalnice.


Začnite investirati enostavno in varno
Pristop k podskladom uredite prek elektronske identifikacije. Celoten postopek opravite digitalno, brez papirjev in brez obiska poslovalnice. Na voljo je 24/7 – ko imate čas, imate tudi dostop.


Pregled nad vašim portfeljem
Aplikacija vam nudi jasen vpogled v stanje vaših naložb in donosnost varčevalnih načrtov. Spremljate lahko tečajnice skladov in analizirate spremembe VEP na dnevnem, enoletnem, triletnem ali petletnem obdobju. Vsak sklad je predstavljen s podatki in grafi, ki vam pomagajo pri odločitvah. Dodali smo tudi prikaz transakcij v obdelavi, da imate vedno popolno preglednost nad svojimi premiki. Če imate urejeno pooblastilo za drugega vlagatelja, imate vpogled in možnost opravljanja prenosov za portfelj drugih vlagateljev.


Prilagajajte svoje naložbe po svojih ciljih
Upravljanje portfelja je preprosto in popolnoma digitalno. Izvajate lahko prenose med podskladi in sklenete nove produkte z enkratnim časovno omejenim geslom (OTP) ter si uredite direktno bremenitev (SEPA) za redna mesečna vplačila.
Za večjo preglednost lahko vsaki naložbi določite svojo oznako, na primer »dopust«, »pokojnina« ali »otroci«, in jo takoj prepoznate. 


Varnost na prvem mestu
Vaše podatke in sredstva varujemo z najvišjimi varnostnimi standardi. Prijavite se lahko z osebnim geslom (PIN kodo) ali z biometrijo. Tako združujemo enostavnost in hitrost z visoko stopnjo varnosti.


Vedno obveščeni
Aplikacija vas sproti obvešča z najnovejšimi strokovnimi članki in obvestili. S potisnimi obvestili prejmete pravočasna opozorila, da ničesar pomembnega ne spregledate. Ko pa potrebujete osebno podporo, lahko v aplikaciji hitro poiščete najbližjo poslovalnico.

Flik Pay omogoča enostavno, hitro in varno plačevanje med uporabniki različnih bank v Sloveniji. 

Enostavno pošljite denar
S Flik Pay lahko denar prijatelju pošljete takoj, brez vnosa številke bančnega računa prejemnika in brez obrazcev. Denar pošljite na enostaven način, izberite njegovo telefonsko številko ali e-naslov in pošljite denar.

Hitro prejmite denar
Denar, ki vam ga bodo nakazali drugi, vam je na razpolago v nekaj sekundah. Storitev je na voljo 24 ur na dan, vse dni v tednu, tudi med vikendi in prazniki.

Za uporabo Flik Pay aplikacije potrebujete:
-	odprt bančni račun, 
-	davčno številko,
-	aktivacijsko kodo ali digitalno identitetno Rekono,
-	omogočen prenos podatkov.

ENG: NLB Pay is a mobile wallet app that facilitates secure, quick, and contactless payments. It allows financial management, card security options, transaction tracking, and making payments from your smartphone. The app features Flik instant payments for immediate money transfer using phone numbers or email addresses, and QR code payments in stores. It integrates seamlessly with Apple Wallet for NLB cards and provides instant transaction updates via push notifications.

SLO: NLB Pay je mobilna denarnica, ki omogoča varna, hitra in brezstična plačila s pametnimi telefoni in napravami. Omogoča tudi dvigovanje gotovine na brezstičnih bančnih avtomatih, varnostno upravljanje kartic in sledenje transakcijam. Aplikacija vključuje Flik takojšnja plačila za takojšnji prenos denarja s pomočjo telefonskih številk ali e-poštnih naslovov ter plačila s QR kodo v trgovinah. Brezhibno se integrira z Apple Walletom za NLB kartice in omogoča takojšnje obveščanje o transakcijah preko potisnih sporočil.
Uporabniki lahko povežejo račune NLB bank, trenutno podprto za banki NLB Slovenija in NLB Črna Gora. NLB kartice je sedaj mogoče dodati neposredno v Apple Wallet prek aplikacije.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

mDenarnic@ je mobilna denarnica, ki omogoča:

- Takojšnje nakazilo denarja ali pošiljanje zahtevka za takojšnji prejem denarja s pomočjo kontaktnega podatka (številke mobilnega telefona ali elektronskega naslova) prek Flik z neposredno bremenitvijo osebnega računa. Znesek je na računu prejemnika takoj, tudi ob vikendih in praznikih.

- Hrambo vaših kartic zvestobe. Mobilna denarnica mDenarnic@ hrani vaše digitalne kartice zvestobe, zaradi česar lahko svojo fizično denarnico razbremenite plastičnih kartic zvestobe.


Uporabljate jo lahko uporabniki pametnih mobilnih naprav z operacijskim sistemom iOS različice iOS 13 ali višje.


Začetek uporabe mDenarnic@ je hiter in preprost. Izvedete ga v le nekaj korakih brez obiska poslovalnice (če banka že ima potrebne podatke, to je vašo davčno številko in številko mobilnega telefona).


Za več informacij pišite na info@otpbanka.si.

Aircash is a multi-currency digital wallet and issuer of the Aircash Mastercard card.

With Aircash, users can top up instantly and easily with cash or any credit/debit card. Withdraw money at any ATM, point of sale of Aircash partners or bank account. Send to friends or family, pay for various services, buy telecom and digital vouchers and top up numerous online accounts.
With Aircash, you have full control over your money – fast, easy, and always available. With the Aircash Wallet and Aircash Prepaid Mastercard, you have worldwide flexibility, whether online, in stores, or at ATMs.

AIRCASH MASTERCARD
Get the Aircash Mastercard at our retail locations or through Amazon and use it at over 30 million locations worldwide. The card is managed directly through your Aircash Wallet – simply load it and get started!

DEPOSIT
Instantly and fee-free, load funds to your Aircash Wallet with cash at more than 200,000 retail locations or with any credit/debit card.

MONEY TRANSFER
Send money to friends and family, no matter where they are. The funds are available in seconds in their Aircash Wallet in their currency.

SERVICES
Buy tickets, pay bills, get vouchers, and top up online accounts – all in one app.

WITHDRAWAL
No problem – use your Aircash Mastercard at ATMs worldwide or withdraw cash from your Aircash Wallet at selected retail locations.

Get the Aircash app now and enjoy all the everyday benefits Aircash has to offer!

developer: Financial Administration of the Republic of Slovenia
description:
Izpolnite davčne obveznosti na enostaven in hiter način! 

Mobilna aplikacija eDavki vam omogoča hiter dostop do vseh davčnih informacij in obveznosti. Ne glede na to, ali ste posameznik, podjetnik ali zakoniti zastopnik družbe, eDavki poenostavljajo vaše poslovanje s Finančno upravo RS.

Glavne značilnosti aplikacije:

Enostavno oddajanje davčnih obrazcev: Hitro in varno oddajte svoje davčne napovedi in obračune neposredno preko mobilne aplikacije.

Elektronsko vročanje dokumentov: Hitro in enostavno prejemajte svoje davčne dokumente v mobilno aplikacijo eDavki.

Pregled nad davčnimi obveznostmi in vračili: Ostanite na tekočem z vsemi svojimi davčnimi obveznostmi in potencialnimi vračili.

Varnost in zasebnost: Zagotovljena je najvišja raven varnosti in zasebnosti vaših podatkov.

Delo v imenu drugega zavezanca: Urejajte davčne zadeve za svoje otroke, svoje podjetje, za društva, če ste predsednik društva in za vse ostale zavezance, ki so vas pooblastili.

Zakaj izbrati eDavke?
 - Prihranite čas: Upravljajte davčne zadeve hitro in učinkovito, kadar koli in kjer koli.
 - Enostavna prijava z uporabniškim računom: Uporabniški račun ustvarite kar v mobilni aplikaciji. 
 - Uporabniku prijazen vmesnik: Enostaven in intuitiven vmesnik, primeren za vse vrste uporabnikov.
 - Enostaven pregled nad davčnimi obveznostmi in vračili.
 - Moderno plačevanje davkov: Uporaba modernih plačilnih metod (Flik, kartično poslovanje).
 - Predizpolnjena vloga: Če so na voljo podatki prejšnjih let, vam vlogo predizpolnimo, vi pa samo preverite točnost podatkov. 

Prenesite eDavke zdaj in začnite upravljati svoje davčne zadeve z lahkoto!

Tablični računalniki (vključno z fold mobilnimi napravami) niso uradno podprti.

Mobilna aplikacija Triglav Investments vam omogoča celovit pregled nad dogajanjem na kapitalskih trgih, pregled aktualnih naložbenih komentarjev naših upravljavcev in analitikov ter uporabne vlagateljske novice tako za začetnike kot za že izkušene investitorje. Z aktualnim naborom novic in pregledom tečajnice je namenjena vsem, ki vas zanima svet financ. Vlagateljem v Triglav vzajemne sklade pa omogoča tudi celovit in strukturiran pregled nad naložbenim portfeljem vzajemnih skladov ter izvedenimi transakcijami, saj omogoča oddajo naročil za enkratne in večkratne direktne bremenitve SEPA, prenose med vzajemnimi skladi in tudi izplačila. 
Sodobni pristopi k upravljanju z dokumenti omogočajo digitalno poslovanje, saj vsa naročila oddajate prek mobilne aplikacije. Najvišji varnostni standardi in potrjevanje naročil z osebnim geslom (PIN kodo) ali uporabo biometričnih podatkov omogočajo visoko varnost vaših podatkov in onemogočajo razpolaganje z vašimi sredstvi s strani nepooblaščenih oseb. 
Pomembna in priročna funkcionalnost oddaje naloga za enkratno in večkratno SEPA direktno bremenitev vam omogoča, da dodatna vplačila uredite na enem mestu, brez (nepotrebnega) upravljanja plačilnih nalogov v svoji mobilni banki ali mobilni denarnici. 
Preprosta oddaja naloga za prenos sredstev med vzajemnimi skladi vam omogoča, da 24/7 enostavno in hitro prilagajate svoj portfelj razmeram na kapitalskih trgih brez obiska poslovalnice. 
Funkcionalnost ustvarjanja in spremljanja finančnih ciljev omogoča uporabnikom, da načrtujejo svoje izdatke in zanje tudi ciljano varčujejo. 
Mobilna aplikacija Triglav Investments omogoča tudi, da se uporabniki, ki jih vlaganje v vzajemne sklade zanima, lahko o njem poučijo s pomočjo demo verzije mobilne aplikacije, ki ponuja vpogled v njeno delovanje in v ključne funkcionalnosti. Obenem mobilna aplikacija omogoča tudi popolnoma digitalen pristop k vzajemnim skladom s pomočjo računa Rekono, ki predstavlja vaše sredstvo elektronske identifikacije za varno predstavitev pri poslovanju na spletu, s katerim izkazujete svojo identiteto na najvišji ravni zanesljivosti. 
Vse naštete funkcionalnosti, poleg tega pa še spremljanje dogajanja, dostop do novic, opozorila na novosti s sistemom "potisnih obvestil" so prednosti, ki jih cenijo vsi izkušeni uporabniki, vlagateljem začetnikom pa pomagajo pri prvih korakih investiranja v vzajemne sklade.

Prenovili smo NLB Klik!
 
NLB Klik je na voljo vsem strankam NLB, ki želijo do svojih financ dostopati hitro, kjerkoli in kadarkoli ter z njimi upravljati brez obiska poslovalnice. 
 
Nov videz, še boljša izkušnja:
•	hitrejši pregled nad plačili in vašimi financami
•	preprosto upravljanje produktov in izbira najljubšega računa za lažje poslovanje
•	nov način potrjevanja plačil iz spletne banke – namesto enkratnega SMS gesla boste prejeli potisno obvestilo v NLB Klik na vašem telefonu
•	sklepanje poslov in oddaljeno podpisovanje dokumentov,
•	upravljanje s plačilno kartico,
•	ogled in upravljanje s produkti (prihranki, depoziti in krediti),
•	upravljanje s prejemniki, e-računi in trajnimi nalogi,
•	ogled in prenos izpiskov,
•	spremljanje in nadzor porabe,
•	upravljanje bančnih kanalov (spletna in mobilna banka), 
•	menjalnica. 
 
Kako začeti?
1.	Prenesite in namestite aplikacijo NLB Klik.
2.	Naročite vklop aplikacije - preko video klica ali v najbližji NLB Poslovalnici.
3.	Aktivirajte generator enkratnih gesel in se prijavite v NLB Klik.
 
Podrobnejša navodila za aktiviranje NLB Klika najdete na spletnih straneh NLB.

 

We have revamped NLB Klik!
 
NLB Klik is available to all NLB customers who want to access their finances quickly, anywhere and anytime and manage them without visiting a branch.
 
New look, even better experience: 
•	faster overview of payments and your finances 
•	simple product management and selection of your favorite account for easier business 
•	new way to confirm payments from the online bank – instead of a one-time SMS password, you will receive a push notification in NLB Klik on your phone 
•	concluding transactions and remotely signing documents, 
•	payment card management, 
•	viewing and managing products (savings, deposits and loans), 
•	managing recipients, e-invoices and standing orders, 
•	viewing and downloading statements, 
•	monitoring and controlling spending, 
•	management of banking channels (online and mobile bank),
•	currency exchange.
 

How to get started?
 
1.	Download and install the NLB Klik application. 
2.	Order application activation - via video call or at the nearest NLB Branch. 
3.	Activate the one-time password generator and log in to NLB Klik.
 
Detailed instructions for activating NLB Klik can be found on the NLB website.

Prenesite mBank@Net in se registrirajte v 1 minuti, brez obiska poslovalnice. Po registraciji boste lahko uporabljali enako uporabniško ime in geslo tako za Bank@Net kot tudi za mBank@Net. Za hitrejšo prijavo pa uporabite FaceID ali TouchID.

Še nimate računa pri OTP banki? Brez problema! Z mBank@Net aplikacijo lahko odprete bančni račun hitro in digitalno, brez obiska poslovalnice. Preizkusite nas za 9 mesecev brezplačno!

Funkcionalnosti:

- Pregled vaših bančnih poslov in storitev
- Vpogled v številko kartice, CVV in PIN – Edina banka v Sloveniji, ki ponuja to možnost!
- Spremembe limitov na karticah.
- Zahtevajte ali pošljite denar z »Nakaži mi«.
- Skenirajte več položnic hkrati in potrdite vse naenkrat.
- Sklenite varčevanja, depozite, pakete, naročila kartic in kredite kar iz naše aplikacije.
- In še veliko več… 


Zakaj izbrati mBank@Net?

- Izbrani za napredno digitalno banko v Sloveniji.
- Naše glavne vrednote so varnost, funkcionalnosti in enostavnost uporabe.
- Poslušamo naše uporabnike in redno posodabljamo aplikacijo.

Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who”. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
“Life Changing! I don’t review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!” – Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for “Splitwise Pro”, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You’ll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don’t choose to purchase “Splitwise Pro”, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service “Splitwise Pro”:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

“Splitwise Pro” subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.

D-Mobile je brezplačna aplikacija, ki uporabnikom zagotavlja informacije o uporabi kartice Diners Club.


KAJ JE D-MOBILE?
D-Mobile je mobilna aplikacija, ki vam omogoča potrjevanje spletnih plačil, vpogled v stanje in promet po karticah, pregled limitov, računov in ugodnosti. D-Mobile aplikacija je na voljo vsem imetnikom kartice Diners Club.



KAJ OMOGOČA D-MOBILE?
Z uporabo D-Mobile aplikacije so vam na voljo naslednje funkcionalnosti:
• potrjevanje spletnih plačil
• pregled kartic in prometa po karticah
• pregled stanja in limitov po karticah
• pregled računov
• pregled ugodnosti
• upravljanje s profilom
• upravljanje s karticami



KAKO PRIDOBITI?
Vsi, ki bi želeli uporabljati D-Mobile, vendar kartice Diners Club še nimate, jo lahko naročite kar prek mobile aplikacije. Prenesite si mobilno aplikacijo na vaš telefon in pričnite s postopkom pridobitve kartice.
Vsi obstoječi uporabniki Diners Club mobilno aplikacijo prenesite in namestite na vaš telefon. Za registracijo v aplikacijo si pripravite vašo kartico.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.

Send money, track money transfers, review exchange rates, and find agent locations near you - all on the go with the Western Union® money transfer app.  ​

----- ​ 
WE MOVE MONEY TO MORE THAN 200 COUNTRIES AND TERRITORIES
----- 
Your friends and family can receive the funds directly to their bank account, mobile wallet**, or cash pick up in minutes*** at one of our trusted agent locations. Choose from currencies such as Indian Rupees, Philippine Pesos, US Dollars, and many more.

SET PREFERRED EXCHANGE RATE ALERTS
• Choose your preferred exchange rate and get notified instantly when it’s available. ​ 

SIMPLE CARD SCANNING
• Quickly make a money transfer by setting up card payments on your mobile phone. Avoid mistakes by scanning your credit or debit card using the camera on your device. 
  
PAY THE WAY THAT WORKS FOR YOU
​• Pay directly from your bank account, cash at an agent location, or with a credit****/debit card.
   
START ON THE MONEY TRANSFER APP, PAY IN CASH
• Save time at the counter by starting your money transfer on our app and paying in cash at a participating agent location.

TRACK YOUR TRANSFER
• You can easily track your money transfer via the app at any time using your tracking number (MTCN). Get notified via email when your receiver collects their money. ​

SEND AGAIN QUICKLY
• Save your receiver’s details to your resend list in the app to make repeat transfers fast. ​


----- 
EASY TO SEND, SIMPLE TO RECEIVE
----- 
With the Western Union® money transfer app for mobile, you can choose how your receiver will get their funds. 
​
Bank account
• Transfer money with our app on a mobile phone to billions of bank accounts worldwide, ensuring you stay better connected to those that matter to you most. ​

Mobile wallet
• Depending on the destination country, you can send money from the app directly to your receiver's mobile wallet.**

Cash pickup
• With hundreds of thousands of agent locations, we’re always nearby. Find a convenient agent location today so your receiver can collect their cash in minutes.***

Changed your mind?
• No problem, update the delivery method from cash pickup to bank account, whether you are the sender or receiver.

Western Union has offices worldwide and is headquartered in Denver, 7001 E. Belleview, Denver, CO 80237.  ​

TRADING

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY
